name: WAR Pig - Big Bang
description: Your mission is easy: Destroy the enemy! That is all - no more, no less. Fight your way through many exciting missions in the campaign or compete against each other with up to 6 teams, consisting of 6 pigs each in free play mode.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core Duo 2 2.5 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4800 Series DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard Soundcard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core Duo 2 2.5 GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4800 Series DirectX: Version 9.0c Sound Card: Onboard Soundcard
